Uses of Class
information.PositionedImage

  • Packages that use PositionedImage 
    Package Description
    gui  
    gui.panels  
    managers  

    • Uses of PositionedImage in gui

      Methods in gui with parameters of type PositionedImage 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void GUI.setImage(PositionedImage pi)
      Sets the PositionedImage to ImagePanel, which is painted.

    • Uses of PositionedImage in gui.panels

      Methods in gui.panels with parameters of type PositionedImage 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void ImagePanel.setImage(PositionedImage pi)
      Sets the image.
      void ImagePanel.setImageAndPosition(PositionedImage pi)
      Sets the image and position.

    • Uses of PositionedImage in managers

      Methods in managers that return PositionedImage 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PositionedImage LayerVisualManager.dragLayers(java.awt.Point movement)
      Calculates and creates a new image to be shown in ImagePanel when dragged layers.
      PositionedImage TaskManager.dragLayers(java.awt.Point movement)
      Returns a new calculated image when image dragged.
      PositionedImage LayerVisualManager.getRefreshedImage()
      Returns the refreshed image which is scaled and positioned newly to ImagePanel.
      PositionedImage TaskManager.getRefreshedImage()
      Returns the refreshed image.
      PositionedImage LayerVisualManager.getZoomedImage(java.awt.geom.Point2D focusPoint, double zoomValue) 
      PositionedImage TaskManager.getZoomedImage(java.awt.Point midP, double zoomValue)
      Returns the zoomed image.
      private PositionedImage LayerVisualManager.initAndscaleToImagePanel()
      Initializes and scales image to image panel.
      private PositionedImage LayerVisualManager.scaleToImagePanel(java.awt.image.BufferedImage processedImage, java.awt.Rectangle tempRelativeView)
      Scales image to ImagePanel and finalizes the temporary relative Rectangle to current relative Rectangle.
